messages.content: Dear Neighbours, I live in Eastham and am now retired after spending all my working life in social care, providing services to help people live and stay in their own homes, no matter what their needs are. Under this Tory government, I have seen vital services to help older and disabled people remain in their own homes suffer huge cuts. These services are now at breaking point.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make sure the NHS stays as a free service for all.

issues.health: As an older person, I worry about the NHS and whether I will be able to get the health care I need, when I need it. I've met excellent, caring staff in the NHS, but see that they are overstretched through not enough staff and fewer and fewer resources.

community.content: I live in Eastham and am now retired after spending all my working life in social care, providing services to help people live and stay in their own homes, no matter what their needs are. Under this Tory government, I have seen vital services to help older and disabled people remain in their own homes suffer huge cuts.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in Eastham and am now retired after spending all my working life in social care.

contactInformation.address: 77 New Chester Road, New Ferry, Wirral CH62 1AB

endorsements.endorsement: So, I ask you, please use your vote wisely on Thursday, 12th December and vote for a strong MP, like Alison McGovern.

examples: Dear Neighbours, I live in Eastham and am now retired after spending all my working life in social care, providing services to help people live and stay in their own homes, no matter what their needs are. Under this Tory government, I have seen vital services to help older and disabled people remain in their own homes suffer huge cuts. These services are now at breaking point.
As an older person, I worry about the NHS and whether I will be able to get the health care I need, when I need it.
I've met excellent, caring staff in the NHS, but see that they are overstretched through not enough staff and fewer and fewer resources.
If the Tories get into government again I am very worried because I believe they will sell off more and more of the NHS, and we will end up having to pay for our own health care.
So, I ask you, please use your vote wisely on Thursday, 12th December and vote for a strong MP, like Alison McGovern.
I live in Eastham and am now retired after spending all my working life in social care, providing services to help people live and stay in their own homes, no matter what their needs are.
If the Tories get into government again I am very worried because I believe they will sell off more and more of the NHS, and we will end up having to pay for our own health care.
